name: Slime Faire
description:
A 5-10 minute puzzle game about building a slime farm to compete in the slime faire. You'll buy and strategically place slimes in your farm, using their specials abilities to make the best slimes you can! 

Designed and programmed from scratch in 5 days by myself. The game isn't incredible by any means, but I got an itch to create and actually release something with it being so hard to find a publisher for board games right now. 

Credits

UI: Casual Game UI for Mobile Games by Renderman - https://hcgamestudios.itch.io/casual-game-ui-for-mobile-games

Slime Sprites: Colored Blocks - Space Chicken by Theana Productions - https://theana-productions.itch.io/colored-blocks

Music: Ludum Dare 38 - Track 1 by Abstraction - http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
